::Feline::

She purred as he kissed her.  She put her arms around him and kissed 
him.

In the back of her mind, she was glad.  For she had another one who 
fell for her.  She started wondering if the chip was nessassary.  For 
she had HotRod and Chordate. ANd SKulletron was there for her.  She 
knew it was only a matter of time.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He looked at Blugeon.
> "KitKat? Yes. Everything happans for a reason, and I believe the 
Matrix
> sent me here, to find her." He looks around.
> "Keep your optics on."
> 
> ::K9::
> 
> He awoke, in the Mess Hall. And what a hangover he has.
> "Eeeeerrr..." He stumbles to his room, but passes out again, at his
> door.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He was surprized she didn't try to break it up. But he was glad. 
There
> was something about her, that made him want to be with her.
> He sliped his arms around her, held her close, and kissed her again,
> this time with more "power."
